articles.author: Chicago Tribune
articles.title: Government funding plan collapses as Trump makes new demands
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump abruptly rejected a bipartisan plan Wednesday to prevent a Christmastime government shutdown, instead telling House Speaker Mike Johnson and Republicans to essentially renegotiate — days before a deadline when federal funding runs out.

articles.title: Senators Baffled as Trump, Musk Throw Last-Minute Wrench Into Spending Plan
articles.description: Democratic and Republican senators were stunned when Trump and Musk tanked a bipartisan agreement to avoid a government shutdown.
articles.content:
What's New
U.S. senators were stunned when President-elect Donald Trump and billionaire Elon Musk threw a wrench into a bipartisan plan to avert a government shutdown.

articles.title: JetBlue CEO Calls For ATC And Outdated Tech Overhaul As Trump Prepares To Take Office
articles.description: A new GAO audit reveals the FAA's aging and slow-to-modernize air traffic control systems, with many critical systems at risk of failure.
articles.content: JetBlue CEO Joanna Geraghty has called on President-elect Donald Trump to address long-standing issues within the US air traffic control ( ATC) system, underscoring the need for urgent staffing improvements and modernization. In a television intervie... [4253 chars]

articles.title: Veterans who served with Trump Defense pick Pete Hegseth in combat rave about his brains and valor: 'Breathes the military'
articles.description: Two veterans who served with Secretary of Defense designee Pete Hegseath recounted his valor in combat during their service with him in the Iraq and Afghanistan wars.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump urges US lawmakers to reject spending bill, raising shutdown odds
articles.description: It would be the first government shutdown since one that extended through December 2018 into 2019, during Trump's first four-year White House term.
articles.content:
President-elect Donald Trump Wednesday called on U.S. lawmakers to reject a stopgap bill to keep the government funded past Friday, raising the likelihood of a partial shutdown.

articles.author: CBC.ca
articles.title: Trump starts a victory dance over Canada border moves
articles.description: The running gag about Canada as a 51st state is clearly generating a torrent of yuk-yuks on Fox News, and indignation from Trump's critics. However, new statements from his transition team, press secretary and Capitol Hill Republicans could ultimately point to a more hopeful development for Canada.
articles.content:
U.S. president-elect Donald Trump has been roasting Canada like a maple-glazed ham in recent days. But amid all the sizzle in his punchlines, some less-noticed messages might have more meat on them.
